misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation.
description: The use of AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding is less secure than AES/GCM/NoPadding. AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding uses CBC block mode, which can be vulnerable to padding oracle attacks. AES/GCM/NoPadding uses GCM mode, which is a more secure and modern mode.
